statement.az:
Barƒ±≈ü restoranda yem…ôk yedikd…ôn sonra hesabƒ± ist…ôdi. Hesabƒ±n $n$ manat olduƒüu b…ôlli oldu. Barƒ±≈ü h…ôr zaman √∂d…ôni≈ü ed…ôrk…ôn hesabƒ±n $10$%-i miqdarƒ±nda b…ôx≈üi≈ü d…ô verir, lakin toplam m…ôbl…ôƒü tam manat etmirs…ô, o m…ôbl…ôƒüi yuxarƒ± tam manata tamamlayƒ±r, √ß√ºnki he√ß vaxt q…ôpiyi olmur v…ô kartla √∂d…ôni≈ü etm…ôk ist…ômir.

M…ôs…ôl…ôn, hesab **17** manat olarsa, bu zaman o, …ôlav…ô olaraq **1.7** manat b…ôx≈üi≈ü verm…ôyi d√º≈ü√ºn√ºr. Toplam m…ôbl…ôƒü **18.7** manat edir. Bu halda o, **19** manat √∂d…ôyir.
statement.en:
After eating at the restaurant, Barish asked for the bill. It turned out that Barysh's order cost **n** manats. Barish always gives tips **10%** of the bill when paying, but if the total amount is less than the full manat, Barish adds the amount to the full manat, because he does not have a penny and does not want to pay by card.

For example, if the bill is **17** manats, then Barish thinks to give another **1.7** manats. The total amount is **18.7** manats. In this case, Baris pays AZN **19**.

input_format.az: Yegan…ô s…ôtird…ô bir tam …ôd…ôd **n** (**1** ‚â§ **n** ‚â§ $10^{18}$) restoranda g…ôl…ôn hesab verilir.
input_format.en: One integer **n** (**1** ‚â§ **n** ‚â§ $10^{18}$) - the bill received at the restaurant.

output_format.en: Print the amount of money that Barish will pay for the bill.

scores_format.az: Bu tap≈üƒ±rƒ±qda h…ôr bir d√ºzg√ºn test…ô g√∂r…ô bal verilir. Maksimum bal 100-d√ºr.
scores_format.en: In this task, points are awarded for each correct test. The maximum score is 100.
